plot: Ouyang Lan is a woman doctor who served in the Chinese Volunteer Army in the Korean War. She returns home to Shanghai and a decision to adopt 2 orphaned children of a deceased colleague changes her life.
title: Xin ling shen chu
plot_es: Ouyang Lan is a woman doctor who served in the Chinese Volunteer Army in the Korean War. She returns home to Shanghai and a decision to adopt 2 orphaned children of a deceased colleague changes her life.
plot_en: Ouyang Lan is a woman doctor who served in the Chinese Volunteer Army in the Korean War. She returns home to Shanghai and a decision to adopt 2 orphaned children of a deceased colleague changes her life.
